abstract: Goldman Sachs is allowing employees who make a donation to one of four designated charities to wear jeans to the office every Friday in August.
snippet: Goldman Sachs is allowing employees who make a donation to one of four designated charities to wear jeans to the office every Friday in August.
lead_paragraph: After several pressure-filled months, Goldman Sachs is using the end-of-summer doldrums as an opportunity to unwind.

headline.main: D-Day at Goldman (D for Denim, That Is)
